item.title: Dealing with Burnout, or How I found motivation once again.
item.description: (this turned out a bit long - TL;DR at the end.) During these last few months (Summer/Fall 2020), I found myself in an emotional, (and motivational) slump. Considering the state the world is in, it probably comes as no surprise, but combined with a few developments at work, it resulted in me having next to no drive to solve issues and feeling more and more depressed about the whole situation.
